bio: Flutter developer passionate about crafting stunning, user-friendly apps that combine elegant design with seamless functionality. Dedicated to turning ideas into impactful mobile experiences.

1.name: Tridhya Tech PVT LTD
1.description:
Designed, developed, and tested Android applications using Java and Kotlin with MVC and MVVM patterns, integrating REST APIs and custom resources for enhanced functionality.
Ensured compatibility across devices and OS versions through rigorous testing, optimizing performance, and addressing user feedback to deliver engaging, user-focused mobile solutions.

2.name: WaytoWeb PVT LTD
2.description:
Developed and delivered diverse Flutter and Android applications, including a music player with Firebase integration, real-time location-sharing apps for shipping companies, and an UrbanClap-like suite with push notifications, local storage, and cost calculation features.
Collaborated with clients from requirements gathering to app deployment, ensuring seamless functionality and user experience across Google Play and App Store.

3.name: MindTech Solutions PVT LTD
3.description:
Senior Flutter Developer with a proven track record of delivering high-quality Android and iOS applications, including Uber-like ride-hailing apps with real-time tracking and payment integration (10k+ downloads).
Led a mobile development team, mentoring junior developers and delivering solutions like employee management, onsite work tracking, and inventory management apps to enhance efficiency and streamline processes.

1.name: Regalia '22 Backend
1.description: Backend of Regalia '22, RCCIIT's cultural fest. Handled total entries for 1.2K+ attendees on both the event days each. Also handled on-spot registrations (including sending passes through email using MAILGUN API) and free entries, without encountering a single production bug.

2.name: TechTrix '22 Backend
2.description: Made the backend of TechTrix '22, RCCIIT's tech fest. Handled 435+ participants, 60+ coordinators, and 560+ event registrations, without encountering a single production bug.

3.name: Calculator
3.description: Calculator app based on Soft UI (neumorphism), having simple and advanced modes. Also has a history section to save previously performed operations (using FLUTTER SQLITE). Supports 3 theme modes - system default, light and dark. State management approach used - RIVERPOD. PUBLISHED ON F-DROID.

4.name: flutter_dev_folio
4.description: Minimal, Beautiful and responsive portfolio site template.

5.name: roBOT - Discord bot
5.description: Bot with administrative commands (for kick, ban, mute, etc) and other fun commands (for memes, movies, jokes, etc).

6.name: cinephilic
6.description: A chrome extension for showing the current trending movies in new tab.

7.name: Dictionary
7.description: Multi-language dictionary app with support for audio pronunciation (English only).

8.name: Note
8.description: Simple terminal based Note Taking Application.

9.name: Enigma-tic-cryption
9.description: Follows the exact encryption method used by the enigma. Has multiple modes for setting different rotors.

1.description: Worked in a team (Quasar) at HackNPitchâ€™21 (hackathon organised by JU E-Cell ) and ranked in the top 6 (earned the special mention tag) among 50+ other teams across India.

2.description: Won Filecoin track prize from Filecoin for the best use of Filecoin and/or IPFS in a hackathon project (worth Rs. 20,000).

3.description: Have 600+ reputation points in Stack Overflow.

4.description:
Completed 30 Days of Google Cloud '21.
- Completed Cloud Engineering Track
- Completed Data Science & Machine Learning Track
